dmca.title: DMCA. Copyright violation.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Templatemonster Antipiracy Department
[mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2007 3:36 AM
To: Copyright; Abuse
Subject: DMCA. Copyright violation.

To whom it may concern

Dear Sirs,

As the legal assistant of Templatemonster.com project, I am instructed
to provide you with the following DMCA report.
We received the piracy report that lead to
http://www.allfreetemplates.org website.

It has come to our attention that your or one of your customer's
servers IP address (70.87.162.130), is involved in a grave situation
of unauthorized intellectual and graphic property distribution.

http://www.allfreetemplates.org WEB site distributes stolen web design
materials. These publications have no license support documentation
from the design owning company and general website content confirms
malicious intent against our company.
The exact placement of infringement is:
http://www.allfreetemplates.org/monster-templates-tm-oscommerce-template
s/ 

These threads contain recompiled sources which were ripped from the
original pre-view pages at http://TemplateMonster.com website. All of
the stolen
source numbers (they usually start the topic from words TM) correspond
to the official products numeration.
We direct your attention to the fact of massive publications that
violate the copyrights of all major web design vendors such as boxedArt
and DesignLoad.

Because of the obvious Templatemonster products distribution,
we direct your attention to the terms of our company's License
Agreement (http://www.templatemonster.com/terms.php) which clearly
prohibits the reselling of our products by any potential or current
customer.

Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright -
2002-2005 Artvertex, Inc." The permission of  information
publishing actions from your server is illegal. Templatemonster.com
website
content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or medium
and is therefore making
you the possessor of illegal material. US copyright laws protect all
parts of this material.
The owner of this website has been notified of his actions, and has been
informed of the
consequences. He ignored a feedback request confirming that his site
is illegal and has failed the amicable case solution.

Hence, we demand the immediate removal of
http://www.allfreetemplates.org  account from
your company server and the cease of distribution of any of our products
IMMEDIATELY.
We have already notified our corporate lawyers of this situation and we
will not hesitate to exercise our legal right to pursue this matter in a
court of
law should you fail to meet our demand immediately.

Templatemonster.com is committed to investigating licensing infractions
not
only to protect our own interests but to protect those of the designers
who submit their
designs to us as well. We are contractually obliged to protect the
intellectual property rights
and livelihood of the artists whose work we license. While we support
freedom of expression, we
must enforce our licensing conditions rigorously in order to meet our
responsibilities. We
feel that your cooperation regarding this matter is fully warranted, and
expect it will be
promptly forthcoming.

Thank you and waiting for your prompt answer.
----
Very truly yours,
Ryan Cathcart
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
